subtab.title: Customized Error messages
subtab.description: Displays an error message when the customer is not assigned with any address and delivery method

checkoutcustomization.AddressMessage.title: Address Error Message
checkoutcustomization.AddressMessage.description: Displays an error message when the customer is not assigned with any address.
checkoutcustomization.AddressMessage.default: Please contact support to add new address and for faster checkout.

checkoutcustomization.deliverymethodMess.title: Delivery Method Message
checkoutcustomization.deliverymethodMess.description: Displays an error message when the customer is not assigned with any delivery method.
checkoutcustomization.deliverymethodMess.default: Please Contact Support to get the Delivery method.
